block.p: COHN-Frances. Age 94. Beloved wife of the late Seymour, cherished mother of Paula Semel and Gerald Cohn and mother-in-law of Jessica Cohn and Martin Semel. Devoted grandmother of Michael Semel, Alissa Sherwin, Jennifer Blanchard and Jason Cohn. greatgrandmother of Zachary and Rachel Semel, Kate Sherwin, Andrew and Gregory Blanchard. Services June 2, 9:30AM Schwartz Bros.-Jeffer Memorial Chapel, 114-03 Queens Blvd, Forest Hills
